Package: sk.hax.software.os.command

[Groovy] Class Edit

    • sk.hax.software.os.command.Edit
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      Task

      class Edit

      Edit task used for editing text files. When started, the task sends a special escape character to the terminal. Based on this, the terminal should switch to editing mode. The task also creates or loads the file specified by the first argument sent to it, sending back the current content of the file to the terminal. Afterwards, the task listens for incoming data from the terminal. If it receives some, it updates the content of the file with that data. The task stops if it receives null data or a special escape character.

      Authors:
      mio
